15.eng-name: The Chapters On Judgements From The Messenger of Allah
15.ara-name: كتاب الأحكام عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn Abbas:that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "The partner is the preemptor, and preemption is in everything

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ أَنَّ الشَّرِيكَ شَفِيعٌ
chapter.eng-name: (What Has Been Related About The Partner Is The Preemptor)
